V.iii.5.2.d
.
Evaluation of Nephritis and Cardiovascular Disabilities
38 CFR 4.115
states that separate ratings cannot be assigned for disability from disease of the heart and any form of nephritis.
Reference
: Â For more information on the limits on separate evaluation of nephritis and cardiovascular conditions, see
M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, 7.2.g
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 5 - Cardiovascular System Conditions
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 5, Section None
